movie.title: Christmas with Tucker
movie.description_intro: A young boy learns to be a man after the death of his father and forms a special bond with a dog.
movie.description_full: A young boy learns to be a man after the death of his father and forms a special bond with a dog.

movies.title: Just Cause
movies.summary: Bobby Earl (Blair Underwood) is facing the electric chair for the murder of a young girl. Eight years after the crime, he calls in Paul Armstrong (Sir Sean Connery), a professor of law, to help prove his innocence. Armstrong quickly uncovers some overlooked evidence to present to the local police, but they aren't interested, Bobby was their killer.
movies.description_full: Bobby Earl (Blair Underwood) is facing the electric chair for the murder of a young girl. Armstrong quickly uncovers some overlooked evidence to present to the local police, but they aren't interested, Bobby was their killer.

movies.title: Keep in Touch
movies.summary: After a life crisis, Colin tracks down a forgotten childhood romance in a search to restart his life.
movies.description_full: After a life crisis, Colin tracks down a forgotten childhood romance in a search to restart his life.
movies.synopsis: After a life crisis, Colin tracks down a forgotten childhood romance in a search to restart his life.

movies.title: First Squad: The Moment of Truth
movies.title_english: First Squad: The Moment of Truth
movies.title_long: First Squad: The Moment of Truth (2009)
movies.summary: Set during the opening days of World War II on the Eastern Front. Its main cast are a group of Soviet teenagers with extraordinary abilities; the teenagers have been drafted to form a special unit to fight the invading German army. They are opposed by a Schutzstaffel (SS) officer who is attempting to raise from the dead a supernatural army of crusaders from the 12th-century Order of the Sacred Cross and enlist them in the Nazi cause.

movies.title: Shit Year
movies.summary: An actress finds herself adrift after she quits performing.
